history.deleteModalDescription: This action cannot be undone. Delete this chat history?

upload.uploadedFileError: Error uploading - please try again or contact support.

chatEmptyStateSubtitle: Ask a question or upload a file

defaultExamples.1: What rules apply to digital mail handling in the KMD solution?
defaultExamples.2: How are user roles handled in our property assessment solution?
defaultExamples.3: How does the solution support batch processing of case data?
defaultExamples.placeholder: E.g.: How is input data validated during loading?

gpt4vExamples.1: Compare processing time in batch vs. real-time for different modules.
gpt4vExamples.2: How has case volume developed over the past year?
gpt4vExamples.3: What role does the REST API play in the system's integrations?
gpt4vExamples.placeholder: E.g.: How is an external service called in the integration?

helpTexts.promptTemplate: Overrides the prompt based on questions and search results. Start with '>>>' to add rather than override.
helpTexts.temperature: Adjust answer variation. Higher value = more creative, lower = more consistent.
helpTexts.searchScore: Min. score for search results. Varies depending on search type (hybrid, vector, text).
helpTexts.retrieveNumber: Number of documents retrieved from search.
helpTexts.includeCategory: Limit search to specific categories (if defined).
helpTexts.useSemanticReranker: Enables semantic ranking algorithm from Azure AI Search.
helpTexts.useQueryRewriting: Enables rewriting of search queries based on semantics.
helpTexts.useSemanticCaptions: Insert only the most relevant text snippets from documents rather than entire sections.
helpTexts.reasoningEffort: Set how thoroughly the model should reason. 'High' requires more time.
helpTexts.useGPT4Vision: Allows use of both images and text in the query.
helpTexts.vectorFields: Specify which embeddings to use for vector search.
helpTexts.gpt4VisionInputs: Determine what is sent to the vision model: text, image, or both.
helpTexts.retrievalMode: Choose search method: hybrid, vector only, or text only.
helpTexts.streamChat: Display answers continuously as they are generated.
helpTexts.useOidSecurityFilter: Filter results based on user's OID.
helpTexts.useAgenticRetrieval: Allow multi-query planning via agentic retrieval. Requires semantic ranking.
